title: WC Partners Board Meeting
description: Members of the WC Partners SB40 Board gather in order to discuss and dictate progress and future direction of SB40 budget funds. Meeting is open to the public.

title: Music Therapy
description: Music Therapy is for everyone! Drury University staff and students provide opportunities for individuals to participate in music therapy.
